name: Stanley Tigerman
biography:
Born 1930, Chicago, Illinois.
Studied at M.I.T., Chicago Institute of Design, and Yale University.
Served in the U. S. Navy.
Draftsman and designer in a series of offices.
Since 1964: Principal, Staney Tigerman and Associates Ltd., Chicago.
Has taught at several U. S. universities.

Source: Robert A. M. Stern. "Modern Classicism". New York: Rizzoli International Pulications, 1988. as excerpted in www.greatbuildings.com/architects
